question: What is Tipplr Customer Support number ?
answer: You can reach out to Tipplr customer support number on +91 8929221233 or write to us on support@tipplr.in

question: How do I track my order?
answer: You can track your order under Orders tabs or order status page. In case you want to know where your order is, you can call the delivery partner directly. The delivery partner number is provided on the order status page.

question: I want to cancel the order
answer: We will do our best to accommodate your request if the order is not placed to the restaurant (Customer service number: +91 8929221233 ). Please note that we will have a right to charge a cancellation fee up to full order value to compensate our restaurant and delivery partners if your order has been confirmed.

question: Can I edit my order
answer: Your order can be edited before it reaches the restaurant. You could contact customer support team via chat or call to do so. Once order is placed and restaurant starts preparing your food, you may not edit its contents.

question: Is Tipplr accountable for Quality / Quantity
answer: Quantity and quality of the food is the restaurant's responsibility. However in case of issues with the quality or quantity, kindly submit your feedback and we will pass it on to the restaurant.

question: Do you charge for Delivery ?
answer: Delivery fee varies from city to city and is applicable if order value is below a certain amount. Additionally, certain restaurants might have fixed delivery fees. Delivery fee (if any) is specified on the 'Review Order' page.

question: How long will you take to deliver ?
answer: Standard delivery times vary by the location selected and prevailing conditions. Once you select your location, an estimated delivery time is mentioned for each restaurant.

question: What are your delivery hours ?
answer: Our delivery hours vary for different locations and depends on availability of supply from restaurant partners.

question: Who are tipplr delivery partners
answer: Tipplr has partnered with Dunzo and QWQER as the official delivery partners.

question: Do you support bulk orders ?
answer: Yes, please speak to our customer support executive or write to us on support@tipplr.in and we will help you with the bulk orders.

question: Can I change address / number ?
answer: Any major change in delivery address is not possible after you have placed an order with us. However, slight modifications like changing the flat number, street name, landmark etc. are allowed. If you have received delivery executive details, you can directly call him, else you could contact our customer service team.

question: What payment methods do you accept ?
answer: We accept all Credit/Debit cards, Net banking and all UPI payment options. We do not accept Cash on Delivery or any vouchers such as Sodexo.

question: I cannot find the restaurant I want to order from ?
answer: Please write to us on hello@tipplr.in and provide us the name of the restaurant that you want order from, we will let our team know about this and do our best to have your favourite restaurant on our platform.

question: I want an Invoice for my order ?
answer: Please write to us on support@tipplr.in and we will send you the invoice.

question: What is the Tipplr wallet and can I use it ?
answer: The Tipplr wallet is not for individual customers but rather for our corporate partners to use on a prepaid basis.
